text.key: The following pictures are connected to this document
text.translation: The following pictures are connected to this document
Følgende billeder er knyttet til dokumentet

text.key: Sort order of sub documents - sort according to
text.translation: Sort order of sub documents - sort according to

text.key: Sort order of search results - sort according to
text.translation: Sort order of search results - sort according to

text.key: Are you sure you want to hide the document?
text.translation: Are you sure you want to hide the document?
Tilknyt et nyt billede til dette dokument

text.key: No pictures related to this document
text.translation: No pictures related to this document
Der er ingen billeder tilknyttet dokumentet

text.key: Number of subdocuments on one page
text.translation: Number of subdocuments on one page
Antal underdokumenter, der vises ad gangen

text.key: Number of search results on one page
text.translation: Number of search results on one page
Antal søgeresultater, der vises ad gangen

text.key: Select the picture file (gif or jpg format) you want to connect to the document
text.translation: Select the picture file (gif or jpg format) you want to connect to the document
Vælg den billed-fil (gif eller jpg-format), du vil sende til hjemmesiden som det nye billede
Der opstod en fejl, da dokumentet skulle slettes

text.key: Choose the picture you want to copy to the server
text.translation: Choose the picture you want to copy to the server
Vælg herunder det billede du vil kopierer til serveren
The name of the picture is used in the picture menu when editing a document. Please use a name that gives sense
Billedets navn bruges i billed-menuen, når man redigerer et dokument. Det kan godt betale sig at bruge lange, beskrivende navne

text.key: Is the picture specifically connected to this document?
text.translation: Is the picture specifically connected to this document?
Er biledet specifikt for dette dokument?

text.key: Please specify if the the picture is to be used in other documents or if the picture is specifically connected to this document
text.translation: Please specify if the the picture is to be used in other documents or if the picture is specifically connected to this document
Marker her, om billedet også skal kunne bruges på andre dokumenter, eller om billedet er helt specifikt for dette dokument

text.key: The picture is specifically connected to this document
text.translation: The picture is specifically connected to this document
Billedet er knyttet specifikt til dette dokument

text.key: The picture is common with other documents
text.translation: The picture is common with other documents
The fields below are important if you want your web pages to be easily found by search machines and users of the Internet

Felterne nedenfor er vigtige at udfylde, hvis brugerne skal have optimale muligheder for at søge på hjemmesiden.{br} Felterne er konstrueret i overensstemmelse med Biblioteksstyrelsens retningslinier.

text.key: The file on the server containing the text of the template
text.translation: The file on the server containing the text of the template
Filen på serveren, der indeholder skabelonens tekst

text.key: An error occurred when updating the document
text.translation: An error occurred when updating the document
Der opstod en fejl da dokumentet skulle opdateres

text.key: An error occurred when creating the document
text.translation: An error occurred when creating the document
Der opstod en fejl, da dokumentet blev oprettet

text.key: The public version is not identical to the most recent version
text.translation: The public version is not identical to the most recent version
Den offentlige version er ikke den nyeste

text.key: An error occurred during creation of the group
text.translation: An error occurred during creation of the group
Der opstod en fejl da gruppen skulle oprettes
Klik her for at returnere til oversigten

text.key: An error occurred during deletion of the group
text.translation: An error occurred during deletion of the group
Der opstod en fejl, da gruppen skulle slettes

text.key: The picture is now saved on the site
text.translation: The picture is now saved on the site

text.key: An error occurred when deleting the picture
text.translation: An error occurred when deleting the picture
Der opstod en fejl da billedet skulle slettes

text.key: An error occurred when copying the picture
text.translation: An error occurred when copying the picture
Der opstod en fejl da billedet skulle kopieres

text.key: An error occurred when sending the letter
text.translation: An error occurred when sending the letter
Der opstod en fejl da brevet skulle sendes

text.key: An error occurred when saving the version
text.translation: An error occurred when saving the version
Der opstod en fejl da versionen skulle gemmes

text.key: The new document version is saved
text.translation: The new document version has been saved
Den nye version af dokumentet er gemt

text.key: Click to see the new version
text.translation: Click to see the new version
Klik her for at se det nye version

text.key: An error occurred when publishing the document
text.translation: An error occurred when publishing the document
Der opstod en fejl da dokumentet skulle offentliggøres

text.key: An error occurred when moving the document
text.translation: An error occurred when moving the document
Der opstod en fejl, da dokumentet skulle flyttes

text.key: An error occurred when saving the document
text.translation: An error occurred when saving the document
Der opstod en fejl da dokumentet skulle gemmes

text.key: An error occurred when copying the picture to the site
text.translation: An error occurred when copying the picture to the site
Der opstod en fejl da billedet skulle kopieres til hjemmesiden

text.key: The picture is now copied to the site
text.translation: The picture is now copied to the site
Billedet er nu kopieret til hjemmesiden

text.key: An error occurred when deleting the subscriber
text.translation: An error occurred when deleting the subscriber
Der opstod en fejl da abonnenten skulle slettes

text.key: An error occurred when updating subscriber data
text.translation: An error occurred when updating subscriber data
Der opstod en fejl, da abonnent-data skulle opdateres

text.key: The document is no longer public
text.translation: The document is no longer public

text.key: An error occurred when hiding the document
text.translation: An error occurred when hiding the document
Der opstod en fejl, da dokumentet skulle skjules

text.key: An error occurred when creating the user
text.translation: An error occurred when creating the user
Der opstod en fejl, da brugeren skulle oprettes

text.key: An error occurred when deleteting the user
text.translation: An error occurred when deleteting the user
Der opstod en fejl, da brugeren skulle slettes

text.key: An error occurred when updating user data
text.translation: An error occurred when updating user data
Der opstod en fejl da bruger-data skulle opdateres

text.key: An error occurred when creating the new template
text.translation: An error occurred when creating the new template
Der opstod en fejl, da den nye skabelon skulle oprettes

text.key: Click to enter admin front page
text.translation: Click to enter admin front page
Klik her for at gå til administrationsforsiden

text.key: You're able to choose sub category below
text.translation: You are able to choose sub category below

text.key: You made an error in at least one input field
text.translation: You made an error in at least one input field
Der var fejl i et eller flere input-felter

text.key: A deleted document cannot be re-established
text.translation: A deleted document cannot be re-established
Når et dokument er slettet, kan det ikke gendannes

text.key: You can hide the document instead of deleting it
text.translation: You can hide the document instead of deleting it
I stedet for at slette dokumentet kan det evt. bare skjules

text.key: A deleted picture cannot be re-established
text.translation: A deleted picture cannot be re-established
Når et billede er slettet, kan det ikke gendannes

text.key: Show document address in the letter
text.translation: Show document address in the letter

text.key: Here, you can activate the subscription system manually
text.translation: Here, you can activate the subscription system manually
Her kan du aktivere abonnementssystemet manuelt

text.key: You have not chosen a picture from the menu to your left
text.translation: You have not chosen a picture from the menu to your left!
Du har ikke valgt et billede på menuen til venstre!

Choose the file you want upload to the site. Please note that only files ending on html. or htm. will be shown on the site. Other file types - e.g. word and pdf - will be copied to the server and can be viewed only in a dedicated programme (word, Acrobate Reader etc.){br} To upload a document in another file type, please open the document in the original programme and save in html- or web-format. Then upload the document.

Vælg her den fil, som du vil sende til hjemmesiden som det nye dokument. Bemærk, at {I}kun{/I} filer, der ender med .html eller .htm, bliver vist i midterfeltet. Andre filtyper - som f.eks. word eller pdf - bliver kopieret til serveren og bliver blot vist som linkadresse.{br} Vil du have vist en fil fra word eller WP i midterfeltet, skal du først åbne filen og gemme den i formatet 'HTML' eller Web. Derefter skal du uploade dokumentet.
Short description - and if necessary, connected links
Kort beskrivelse og evt. tilknyttede links

Choose the web address on the text/file you want to upload. The address should start with {b}http://{/b}. To avoid spelling errors, take a copy of the address from another browser window and fill in the address in the field below.

Vælg her web-adressen på den tekst, du vil sende til hjemmesiden som det nye dokument. Adressen bør starte med {b}http://{/b}. Kopier adressen fra et andet browser-vindue med musen og sæt ind her. Så undgås stavefejl.

text.key: to delete the subscriber and all his/her subscriptions
text.translation: to delete the subscriber and all his/her subscriptions
for at slette abonnenten og alle dennes abonnementer
When a subscriber is deleted, the informations cannot be re-established. However, it is always possible to create a new subscription using the same email address as the one you have deleted.
Når en abonnent er slettet, kan oplysningerne ikke gendannes senere. Der er ikke noget, der forhindrer oprettelsen af et nyt abonnement på samme email-adresse.

text.key: The hidden document can be made visible again by publishing it
text.translation: The hidden document can be made visible again by publishing it
Når et dokument er skjult, kan det gøres synligt igen senere ved at offentliggøre det igen

text.key: The file is copied to the server
text.translation: The file is copied to the server
for at redigere det ny dokument
Beskriv dit problem eller spørgsmål her

text.key: please remember to give the message a descriptive headline
text.translation: please remember to give the message a descriptive headline
husk at give meddelelsen en beskrivende overskrift

text.key: Please do not delete the following informations
text.translation: Please do not delete the following informations

text.key: Please send your comments og questions to Magenta. You will receive an answer asap
text.translation: Please send your comments og questions to Magenta. You will receive an answer asap
Send dine kommentarer og spørgsmål om systemet til Magenta. Du vil modtage et svar på din henvendelse hurtigst muligt
Det blev ikke fundet nogen dokumenter
Prøv at justere dine søgekriterier herunder

text.key: Number of hits on each page
text.translation: Number of hits on each page
Vælg hvilken rækkefølge de fundne dokumenter skal vises i

text.key: How should the hits be displayed?
text.translation: How should the hits be displayed?
Vælg fremvisningsformat for de fundne dokumenter:
Arrangører, der ikke er på listen ovenfor

text.key: new line btw. each new organizer
text.translation: new line btw. each new organizer
skift linie mellem hver arrangør, hvis du skal indtaste flere

text.key: fill in only when the event takes more than one day
text.translation: fill in only when the event takes more than one day

text.key: Choose the classification and keywords to be used to find links to related documents.
text.translation: Choose the classification and keywords to be used to find links to related documents
For at hente dokumenter til søgeboksen som relateret viden skal du vælge en eller flere klassifikationskoder og nøgleord

text.key: The fields below are important if you want your web pages to be easily found by search machines and users of the Internet
text.translation: The fields below are important if you want your web pages to be easily found by search machines and users of the Internet
Nedenstående felter er vigtige at udfylde, hvis du ønsker, at dine web-sider nemt skal kunne findes af søgemaskinerne på internettet

text.key: Choose whether this document is eligble for inclusion the section-newsbox, then publish.
text.translation: Choose whether this document is eligble for inclusion the section-newsbox, then publish.
Vælg om dette dokument er kandidat til at komme på områdets nyhedsboks, og offentliggør derefter.

text.key: A Search-document makes it possible to create a free-text search of the entire website.
text.translation: A Search-document makes it possible to create a free-text search of the entire website.
Et søgedokument af denne type giver adgang til fritekstsøgning på hele hjemmesiden
Type keyword (if left blank all keywords are searched for)
Angiv nøgleord (hvis intet er angivet søges på alt)

text.key: HTML-documents can contain HTML in the Text-fields. Using the "Browse"-button below each field a local HTML-file can be uploaded.
text.translation: HTML-documents can contain HTML in the Text-fields. Using the "Browse"-button below each field a local HTML-file can be uploaded.
Denne dokumenttype indeholder HTML i tekstfeltet. Man kan bruge "Gennemse"-knappen under tekstfeltet til at sende en HTML-fil fra sin egen computer til content management systemet.

text.key: The Upload-document if for all types of binary files besides images (for instance PDF-files, Word-documents, Excel-files etc.)
text.translation: The Upload-document if for all types of binary files besides images (for instance PDF-files, Word-documents, Excel-files etc.)

Med Upload-funktionen kan man knytte forskellige typer af filer til systemet, f.eks. PDF-filer, Word-dokumenter og Excel-filer. Fælles for dokumenterne er, at der er tale om binære filer, det vil sige, at de ikke kan vises direkte på hjemmesiden

text.key: Choose the maximum width of the graphics bar
text.translation: Choose the maximum width of the graphics bar

text.key: Documents of this type automatically generates a (dynamic) sitemap.
text.translation: Documents of this type automatically generates a (dynamic) sitemap
Sitemap-dokumentet genererer automatisk et dynamisk sitemap

text.key: The template used send subscription passwords
text.translation: The template used send subscription passwords

text.key: Image-documents are a little special; they do not contain text but instead image-data.
text.translation: Image-documents are a little special; they do not contain text but instead image-data.
Billededokumenter er lidt specielle; de indeholder ikke tekst men i stedet billeddata.

text.key: Link-documents are special because they redirect the user to the web address when clicked. In effect they are placeholders, that enable keeping classification and meta-data for external links.
text.translation: Link-documents are special because they redirect the user to the web address when clicked. In effect they are placeholders, that enable keeping classification and meta-data for external links.

Link-dokumenter sender brugeren videre til den angivne webadresse, når man klikker på det pågældende link. Ved hjælp af klassifikationskoder og metadata kan man opmærke sine links - dvs. eksterne sider - meget præcist

text.key: Make the link subscribeable. This is only usefull in special cases like when you want to make a forum subscribeable
text.translation: Make the link subscribeable. This is only usefull in special cases like when you want to make a forum subscribeable
Man kan abonnere på links. Denne funktion kan blandt andet benyttes i forbindelse med abonnement på nye indlæg i debatfora

text.key: The fields below will be used to find relevant calendar events
text.translation: The fields below will be used to find relevant calendar events
Felterne på denne side bruges til at specificere, hvilke arrangementer der er relevante for denne kalenderside

text.key: In the fields below you can specify your local search
text.translation: In the fields below you can specify your local search
I felterne nedenfor skal du angive kriterierne for den lokale søgning

text.key: Malformed name (letters, numbers, ., _ and - are valid); try again
text.translation: Malformed name (letters, numbers, ., _ and - are valid); try again
Navnet indeholder tegn der ikke er tilladte her (kun bogstaver, tal, punktum, bindestreg og _ er tilladt); prøv igen

text.key: A document of that name already exists here. Please choose another name
text.translation: A document of that name already exists here. Please choose another name
Der findes allerede et dokument med det navn her. Vælg venligst et andet navn
There is no public version of this document
Der findes ingen offentlig version af dette dokument

text.key: Publishing the picture will make it visible on the public part
text.translation: Publishing the picture will make it visible on the public part
Når du offentliggør billedet, bliver det muligt at de det på det offentlige website

text.key: You are trying to store invalid information
text.translation: You are trying to store invalid information
Du er ved at forsøge at gemme ugyldig information

text.key: A comma separated list of fields
text.translation: A comma separated list of fields in the database, which should not be searchable.
En kommasepareret liste af felter i databasen, der ikke

text.key: Choose the appropriate classificationand keywords for this document:
text.translation: Choose appropriate classifications codes and keywords for this document.
Vælg relevante klassifikationskoder og nøgleord til dette dokument

text.key: Choose whether this document is eligble for inclusion in newsboxes, then publish.
text.translation: Choose if this document is eligble for inclusion in the newsbox, then publish
Vælg om dette dokument skal være kandidat til at blive inkluderet i nyhedsboksen på søjlen og offentliggør der-efter.

text.key: Disse felter bliver ikke længere brugt
text.translation: These fields are no longer used
Disse felter bliver ikke længere brugt
Dokument til brug for oprettelse af argumentdokumenter

text.key: How your calendar will be displayed
text.translation: How should the calendar be displayed

text.key: Number of reasons on one page
text.translation: Number of arguments, displayed on one page
Antal af argumenter vist på en side

text.key: Only documents under (set to / for global search)
Publishing the picture will make it visible on the public part of the website.
text.translation: Publishing the picture will make it visible on the public part of the website.
Når du offentliggører billedet vil det være synligt på den offentlige side.
Skal både fil-navnet og titlen vises

text.key: The doctype you want to make a search page for
This page contains basic document information
text.translation: This page contains basic information about the document
Denne side indeholder grundlæggende information om dokumentet

text.key: What doctype the created documents should have
text.translation: What doctype should the created documents have
Hvilken dokumenttype skal det oprettede dokument have

text.key: What language the created documents should have
text.translation: Which language the documents should have

text.key: Where the documents should be created
text.translation: Where in the hiearchy the documents should be created

text.key: You are trying to store invalid information.
text.translation: You are trying to store invalid data
Du forsøger at gemme ugyldig data
Should document be included in section news

text.key: This is an administrative documenttype only.
text.translation: This is an administrative document type only.
Denne dokumenttype er alene beregnet til administrationsformål.

text.key: A comma separated list of fields you don't want to be searchable
text.translation: A comma separated list of fields you don't want to be searchable
En kommasepareret liste af felter den offentlige bruger ikke skal kunne søge på

text.key: Include created documents in subscription when publishing
text.translation: Include created documents in subscription when publishing
Skal de oprettede dokumenter automatisk inkluderes i abonnementudsendelse ved offentliggørelse

text.key: Højreklik på AdminJump-linket nedenfor og vælg 'Føj til foretrukne...'. Hvis værktøjslinien 'Hyperlinks' ikke er slået til, så gør det i menuen 'Vis/Værktøjslinier/Hyperlinks' - og træk derefter linket fra foretrukne menuen ned i værktøjslinien. Knappen 'AdminJump' i værktøjslinien kan nu bruges til at hoppe direkte fra en side på det offentlige website og til administrationsdelens tilsvarende side (og tilbage igen).
text.translation: Højreklik på AdminJump-linket nedenfor og vælg 'Føj til foretrukne...'. Hvis værktøjslinien 'Hyperlinks' ikke er slået til, så gør det i menuen 'Vis/Værktøjslinier/Hyperlinks' - og træk derefter linket fra foretrukne menuen ned i værktøjslinien. Knappen 'AdminJump' i værktøjslinien kan nu bruges til at hoppe direkte fra en side på det offentlige website og til administrationsdelens tilsvarende side (og tilbage igen).

text.key: Administration af brugere, grupper, abonnenter og login-adgang:
text.translation: Administration of users, groups, subscribers and login:
Administration af brugere, grupper, abonnenter og login-adgang:
version of this document has not yet been created
version af dette dokument er endnu ikke blevet oprettet
Click here to create the first missing part
Klik her for at oprette den første manglende del
version of this document has not yet been created
version af dette dokument er endnu ikke oprettet
Klik her for at oprette den
Click here to go to the
Klik her for at gå til den
This linkdocument isn't shown as a document on the public website as such; if you click on it, you will be automatically transferred to
Dette linkdokument ses ikke som et dokument på det offentlige website; hvis man klikker sig ind på det, kommer man automatisk direkte til adressen
Arrangementer fra og med denne dato (2003-12-01)
Arrangementer til og med denne dato (2003-12-31)

text.key: Warning! Deleted versions can never be recovered
text.translation: Warning! Deleted versions can never be recovered
Advarsel! Slettede version kan aldrig genskabes

text.key: Are you sure you want to delete the following version
text.translation: Are you sure you want to delete the following version
Er du sikker på du vil slette følgende version

text.key: There was a problem deleting the version
text.translation: There was a problem deleting the version
Der opstod et problem under sletning af versionen

text.key: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document:
text.translation: Choose the appropriate keywords for this document:
Vælg relevante nøgleord til dette dokument:
Teaser (if this field is filled out, the text will replace the text above the checkboxes)
Resumé (Hvis feltet udfyldes erstatter denne tekst teksten over checkboksene)

text.key: Only show events under this page (set to / for global search)
text.translation: Only show events under this page (set to / for global search)
Vis kun arrangementer under denne url

text.key: Be aware that you will delete the entire document and all versions.
text.translation: Be aware that you will delete the entire document and all versions.
Vær opmærksom på, at sletningen gælder det samlede dokument og dermed alle versioner.

text.key: You can delete a single version under the edit page 'About the document'
text.translation: You can delete a single version under the edit page 'About the document'
Sletning af en enkelt version kan foretages på redigeringssiden 'Om dokumentet'
